revised_title: A Comprehensive Osteology of Hypsilophodon Foxii: A British Wealden Dinosaur
tldr: This article presents a detailed osteology of Hypsilophodon Foxii, a dinosaur found in the Wealden Formation on the Isle of Wight. The author, J.W. Hulke, provides a comprehensive analysis of the dinosaur's skeleton, highlighting its unique features and its significance in understanding the evolution of dinosaurs and their relationship to modern reptiles and birds.
